issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Pressing tab while holding the iphone in landscape mode opens the window in Landscape mode first and then after some time returns to portrait mode automatically.

This is not a regression.This even occurs on 2.1.2.GA

Steps To reproduce:

1. Run the Kitchen Sink application
2. Rotate the device in Landscape mode
3. Tap on Platform Tab.(Wait for few seconds)

Actual Result:
The window opens in lanscape mode for some time and then returns to portrait mode automatically.

Expected Result:
The window should remain in Lanscape mode.
fields.summary: iOS: Kitchen Sink - Pressing tab while holding the phone in landscape mode opens the window in landscape mode temporarily
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium Studio:2.1.2.201208301612
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.3.v20120915120319
iOS Device: iPhone 4s(5.1)
OS: Mac OSX 10.8.1

comments.body:
I observed that  in landscape mode if we pressing any tab it  returns to portrait mode for few moments then again return back to landscape mode.

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
